MIB XG-FIREWALL-MIB - sophos

Available versions


  • ver. 5.0
  • ver. 5.4


MIB XG-FIREWALL-MIB - sophos

Overview

Used mib2template to convert oficial Sophos XG MIB to Template.

Tested on Zabbix 3.2 using a XG 105 Appliance.

Need to set a Macro for {$SNMP_COMMUNITY} with the community name on the Firewall.

It does not contain Interface Discovery, but native SNMP Interface template does the job.

Author

Paulo S. D. Vasques

Macros used

There are no macros links in this template.

Template links

There are no template links in this template.

Discovery rules

There are no discovery rules in this template.

MIB XG-FIREWALL-MIB - sophos

Overview

Used mib2template to convert oficial Sophos XG MIB to Template.

Tested on Zabbix 3.2 using a XG 105 Appliance.

Need to set a Macro for {$SNMP_COMMUNITY} with the community name on the Firewall.

It does not contain Interface Discovery, but native SNMP Interface template does the job.

Author

Paulo S. D. Vasques

Macros used

There are no macros links in this template.

Template links

There are no template links in this template.

Discovery rules

There are no discovery rules in this template.
